turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm looking to order three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of toppings would you like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I want two of them to be veggie lovers and then the other one I want to be a chicken alfredo.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I want all of them to be the large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me repeat that order back to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas, 2 veggie lovers, 1 chicken alfredo.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I forgot. Could you make all of them thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me add that to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large thin crust pizzas, 2 veggie lovers, 1 chicken alfredo.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, would you like to add any sides or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will come out to $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, just pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it will be ready for pickup in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's all I need. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizza.
